component.name: getCustomObjects
component.description: Retrieves all custom objects that match the criteria specified in parameters.

component.name: getCustomObjectById
component.description: Retrieves the custom object with the specified id.

component.name: getExportsOfCustomObject
component.description: Retrieves the list of export definitions for the custom object with the specified id.

component.name: getFieldsOfCustomObject
component.description: Retrieves all custom object fields for the custom object with the given id.

component.name: getImportsOfCustomObject
component.description: Retrieves the list of import definitions for the custom object with the specified id.

component.name: getCustomObjectExportById
component.description: Retrieves the specified custom object export definition.

component.name: getCustomObjectExportDataById
component.description: Retrieves the data for the custom object export with the specified id.

component.name: getCustomObjectImportById
component.description: Retrieves the specified custom object import definition.

component.name: createCustomObjectExport
component.description: Creates a new export definition to export data for the specified custom object.

component.name: createCustomObjectImport
component.description: Creates a new import definition to import data for the specified custom object.

component.name: createCustomObjectImportData
component.description: Submit the data for the specified custom object import.

component.name: updateCustomObjectExport
component.description: Updates the specified custom object export definition.

component.name: updateCustomObjectImport
component.description: Updates the specified custom object import definition.

component.name: deleteCustomObjectExport
component.description: Deletes a stored export definition for a specified custom object.

component.name: deleteCustomObjectExportData
component.description: Deletes a specific custom object export's data.

component.name: deleteCustomObjectImport
component.description: Deletes a stored import definition for a specified custom object.

component.name: deleteCustomObjectImportData
component.description: Deletes a specific custom object import's data.
